name: Primeview USA
overview:
Primeview was launched in 1997 as a company specializing in Advance Display Solutions. Leveraging our knowledge and experiences with the demanding Military, Healthcare and Broadcast sectors Primeview entered into the corporate market with capabilities to handle any project Size or type.  To the request of our global customers, in 2007 Primeview USA was launched in New York City as a sales and support hub for the US display market.

Primeview offers a ”one stop shop” for display solution like Video walls, digital signage, video conferencing systems, high brightness displays, multi touch-screens, kiosks, watherproof monitors, Transparent Displays, Military Spec, specialty displays and more. For the commercial market we offer the highest quality of display products to support industrial capacities, with the mind-set to offer the same models for years to come.

Utilizing our in-house R&D facilities and personnel of designers + engineers PRIMEVIEW are the first and fastest to offer the newest display technologies to their clients Having our own R & D personnel has allowed us to develop and deploy CUSTOM displays for custom weatherproof solutions, GSM based solutions, daylight readable monitors, glass protected displays,  and many other LCD solutions.
